metadata.title: CVE-2023-52805 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: jfs:fix array-index-out-of-bounds in diAlloc Currently there is not checkagainst the agno of the iag while allocating new inodes to avoidfragmentation problem. Added the check which is required.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
